name: Cory
bio: Cory came on as an apprentice in the summer of 2014. Dedication is not the word to explain what he showed. He worked hard to get to where he is and now he eats, sleeps and breathes barbering. Sit with Cory and sometimes you actually forget your hair is being cut. It's an experience when you sit with him.

name: Amber
bio: When a hairstylist applies and says "I want to be a barber" you take them and you teach them. Amber is a welcome addition to Sailor Bup's. Her level of service is second to none. A great haircut, awesome conversation and a personality that can't be matched.

name: Mark
bio: Focusing on classic and traditional barbering with training from Schorem barbershop in Holland and Savills Barbershop in the U.K, Mark takes a different approach at barbering in Halifax. It may be a bit longer for a service, but it's all in the training. Mark is an ambassador for Wahl (Canada), Reuzel Pomade (Holland), Mens Dept (Canada) and Mizuatani Scissors (Japan).

name: Robyn
bio: Robyn came to Sailor Bup's fresh from hair school with an interest in barbering and not working in a salon environment. She worked hard at learning this trade after being taught skills that are completely different and is one of the shop's most tenured employees since it opened.

name: Robin
bio: With a few years of barbering in Western Canada under her belt, Robyn moved back home and is now part of our crew. New to us doesn't mean new to the trade so book in and see what she can do.
